Class GenomeWidthChooser

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container

                      yu.einstein.gdp2.gui.dialog.GenomeWidthChooser
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants
public final class GenomeWidthChooser
extends javax.swing.JDialog

A dialog box used to choose a value for the sigma parameter of a gaussian filter.

Version:
0.1
Author:
Julien Lajugie
See Also:
Serialized Form

Constructor Detail

GenomeWidthChooser

private GenomeWidthChooser(java.awt.Component parent)
Private constructor. Used internally to create a GenomeWidthChooser dialog.

Parameters:
parent - The parent Component from which the dialog is displayed.
Method Detail

initComponent

private void initComponent()
Creates the component and all the subcomponents.

jbCancelActionPerformed

private void jbCancelActionPerformed()
Closes the dialog. No action are performed.

jbOkActionPerformed

private void jbOkActionPerformed()
Closes the dialog. Sets validated to true so the main function can return the two selected curves.

jftfSigmaPropertyChange

private void jftfSigmaPropertyChange()
Changes the text of textField jftfGenomicWidth when the scrollBar jftfSigma is used.

jsbSigmaAdjustmentValueChanged

private void jsbSigmaAdjustmentValueChanged()
Changes the position of the scrollBar jftfSigma when the value of the textField jsbSigma changes.

getSigma

public static java.lang.Integer getSigma(java.awt.Component parent,
                                         int aWindowSize)
Displays a GenomeWidthChooser dialog, and returns an integer value for sigma.

Parameters:
parent - The parent Component from which the dialog is displayed..
aWindowSize - a size of bins.
Returns:
An Integer value of sigma if OK has been pressed. Null otherwise.

getMovingStdDevWidth

public static java.lang.Integer getMovingStdDevWidth(java.awt.Component parent,
                                                     int aWindowSize)
Displays a GenomeWidthChooser dialog, and returns an integer value for the width of a moving standard deviation.

Parameters:
parent - The parent Component from which the dialog is displayed..
aWindowSize - greatest size of the bins of the curves.
Returns:
An Integer value if OK has been pressed. Null otherwise.
